results.title: Inspirational Shirt | Think Less Love More Women Premium Tshirt | Mental Health Shirt | Warrior Not Worrier
results.description:
Sometimes we all need to remember we must go with the flow. This funky tee will remind you to stop overthinking and let in the love wherever you find it.Made with 100% Airlume combed and ringspun cotton (fiber content may vary for different colors). Lightweight fabric (4.2 oz) with fitted bicep cuff that adds just a bit of an enhanced look versus looser tees. Unisex fit runs true to size, and looks great on both sexes!

*Please note that sleeves are not stitched and rolled by hand for photos.

» Size Options 
Please scroll through the photos to see the size chart. For unisex sizing, men should select their typical size. Women typically size one down for a similar fitted style. 
<< ADVICE  >> - Take one of your favorite tees at home and measure from armpit to armpit. Compare that measurement to our size chart and choose the size that reflects that measurement. 

» Shipping & Processing Time
Items are made-to-order, and we aim to dispatch in 1-5 business days. We always strive to ship our items out as soon as possible and typically do. 

» Wash & Care Instructions
- Machine wash cold inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach only when necessary. No fabric softeners.
- Tumble dry low or hang-dry for longest life.
- Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration.
- Do not dry clean.

» Customization
If you want to add customization to some of our designs or have any special requests or questions at all, please get in touch!

* Follow us on Instagram @gutsyonline for new releases and promotions.
* Visit our Storefront at etsy.com/shop/gutsyonline

Our customer's satisfaction is very important to us! If there is anything that we could do for you, please don't hesitate to message us!

results.title: Live Laugh Limp Bizkit Print Live laugh love home decor Limp Bizkit Art Print A4/ A5 Print only home interior
results.description:
Hey! Please find all the info for your funky carrot club item below.

Title
Live Laugh Limp Bizkit print unframed A4/A5 print.

Description
A new take on live laugh love wall decor,

Where it starts
Eclectic, odd and a bit cray cray, all my designs come from some of classic favourite films, songs, animals, quotes and other quirky inspirational paraphernalia. All my prints are created digitally.

How it happens
I use a HP printer and use Archival Matte paper which is known to prevent any discolouration and is of optimum quality for each picture. Please ensure that you are super careful where you place your print and that it is not in direct sunlight. Please note the colours on the photographs online, may differ slightly to the product displayed on your computer monitor.

The prints
I sell all prints unframed, however all prints are created in compatible sizes. I always feel that the frame is personal to you, with colour, style etc. Each print has a small white edge giving you a great opportunity with mounts within a frame or not.  
 A4 = 210mm x 297mm / 8.3" x 11.7"
 A5 = 148 x 210 mm/  5.8" x 8.3"
Each print is protected by card and a cellophane package, included with a thank you note from myself, wrapped in funky pink tissue paper and sealed with a sticker, it is then inserted into a hard backed envelope. 
I send out my prints via Royal Mail 2nd class signed for and lucky for some….Postage to the UK is Freeee!

A note from me
Thank you for looking at my prints, I appreciate your time. If you have any questions please contact me and I'll do my best to help. Please see my Etsy shop for other prints, you can look at the different sections that I have. Each purchase that you make means the world to me and my family <3

Follow me on Instagram and Facebook for new designs and exclusive special offers.
@Funkycarrotclub

Happy Shopping

results.title: Live Laugh Love handlettered rubber stamp
results.description:
Beautify your crafts and cards with a hand carved rubber stamp! The words "Live, laugh, love" are hand-lettered by Burgerisad and carved by me onto quality rubber. The stamp is mounted on a wood handle for better grip.

View listing by Burgerisad:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/275422860/live-laugh-love-digital-print-instant?ref=shop_home_active_2

Dimensions:
The wood mount measures 5 by 5cm.

Instructions:
Press the stamp firmly onto papers or cloth to make an impression. To clean the stamp after impressing, gently pat them on tissue to remove any of the remaining ink.


Payment methods:
For Singapore buyers, I accept paypal (you can just make the purchase here) and bank transfer (just drop me an email at baisimu [!at] gmail.com with your orders).
For worldwide buyers, I accept only paypal.

results.title: Simply Cross Stitch Magazine September/October 1996
results.description:
This a cross stitch pattern magazine only.  It is not a kit or a completed project.  The magazine is from 1996.  It has 31 pages.  It has some shelf wear but overall it is in good used condition with no rips or stains.

Patterns are:
Wendy Witch - Bette Ashley
Vegetable Packets - Kathleen Hurley
Folk Art Mugs (Stars, Buttons) - Jacquelyn Fox
Vacation Memories - Mary T. Cosgrove
Words Of Wisdom (Honor, Cheerful, Cup) - Mike Vickery
Butterfly Garden - Dayna Stedry Kilian
Mouse Work - Judy M. Chrispens
Costume Party (Wizard, Kitty) -Mona Eno
Halloween Jewelry (Pin, Earring) - Nancy Marshall
Water Critters ( Turtle, Frog) - Mary T. Cosgrove
Live, Laugh, Love - Dayna Stedy Kilian

It will be shipped first class USPS with tracking in a rigid mailer. First class international outside the US.

Check out my other shop for completed projects here! https://www.etsy.com/shop/NeedleNosey?ref=si_shop

results.title: Blank Wood Sign 12" x 10"
results.description: This piece measures approximately 12" x 10", the planks are 3 1/8" wide and 5/8" thick. Each plank is 10" and there is 2" between the levels. This is made from reclaimed pallet wood and the type of wood varies. I sanded these after they were glued together and put quite a bit of pressure without the slats budging. The back slats are nailed and glued so it is nice and sturdy. It is ready for paint, stain, or enjoy the rustic look! When I ship these, I shrink wrap, protect the corners, and layer with cardboard.

results.title: LIVE LOVE LAUGH Inspirational Saying Positive Message Butterfly Glass Tile Pendant Necklace Keyring
results.description:
***ALL GLASS PENDANTS CAN BE MADE INTO NECKLACES OR KEYRINGS - PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR CHOICE AT CHECKOUT**  **Glass tile pendants are handmade to order and are usually shipped out within 48 hours after paid purchase.**

**Altered Art Glass Tile Pendant - This gorgeous handmade pendant is crafted from a hand-cut 1 inch square, 1/4 inch thick crystal clear glass tile with smoothed, rounded corners. Superior quality photo graphics/artwork are mounted to the back and permanently sealed with several layers of a protective clear 3-D glaze that hardens to a glass-like finish. Mounted to the back is a beatiful silver plated Aanraku bail that allows the pendant to hang from a necklace or keychain ring. NOTE : Colors may vary slightly from picture shown, as well as image placement.

** Includes YOUR CHOICE of a beautiful 24 inch silver plated steel ball chain necklace (can easily be shortened, if desired -just simply snip with scissors) OR silver keyring!

**Includes a gorgeous organza jewelry gift bag! (see pic) (colors may vary -perfect for gift giving or just for yourself!)

Pendants are water-resistant, but not waterproof! Make sure to remove them before showering, swimming or exercising. Not intended for small children due to small parts/choking hazard.
 
***Purchase more than one pendant and each additional purchased pendant has a shipping fee of only $1.00! ***

results.title: Laugh More Printable Print, Motivational Print, Kids Room Print
results.description:
The best advice for adults and children: Laugh More! A motivational printable print for your kids' room, living room, playroom that can inspire the whole family!

Download the file, print it out instantly at home or at a local print shop and use it to create a poster, a card or even a t-shirt!

It also makes a lovely last minute gift!

The print comes as high-quality PDF AND JPG printable DIGITAL files which you can print as many times as you want, on any paper quality and size you desire! Plus there are no shipping fees since you can download it instantly through etsy!

Background Color: White
Text Color: Black

After the payment successfully processes, you will receive an email notification from etsy letting you know that your file is ready to be downloaded on the Downloads page.

What you’ll need to print out the file:
- computer & printer
- printing paper on any size or quality you desire
- Adobe Reader to be able to view the PDF file. You can download it for free here:
http://get.adobe.com/reader/

Please note: The file is for personal use only. It can not be redistributed in any way. This includes, but is not limited to, sharing, selling, reselling, and altering. Electronic transmission to third parties is strictly prohibited.

Please note: This is a digital file, therefore I cannot offer refunds. If, nevertheless, you have problems with the digital file, please let me know.

Artwork and Design © Bert and Mary Designs. All Rights Reserved.

results.title: SVG Digital Design file "live love laugh""believe hope dream" Instant Download- Includes svg, png, jpeg, dxf, & eps formats.
results.description:
"live love laugh"-"believe hope dream"  instant download digital design file. 

Use this file with your cutting machine such as Cricut or Silhouette, that will load and cut digital files. Includes svg, png, dxf, and eps formats.

All files have been pretested for cutting accuracy.

This is a digital download file only. There is no physical item shipped.

PLEASE be sure you know how to import and use the file with your particular machine and software and that one of the listed formats will work with your machine as there are NO REFUNDS for digital downloads.

IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ ALL INFO BELOW BEFORE MAKING YOUR PURCHASE.

You understand and agree when making this purchase, that this design is solely for use by you and you WILL NOT share or sell this file in whole or any part there of.

How can I use the files?
You may create a physical product for personal use or as a gift.
You may create a physical product for small business use that you sell at a local craft fair. or online (MUST have substantial WATERMARK to prevent theft by tracing of design).
You can create a sublimation print that you place on physical products that you sell yourself.
Small business use is defined as less than 500 products produced.

POD (Print-on-demand) is NOT allowed with my designs. Using Thyme4K designs to make sublimation transfers to re-sell is also not allowed. Please read the terms of use carefully that are included in with each design before using.

Digitizing of design to sell as embroidery file is NOT allowed.
At this time, Orange Elephant Embroidery has the exclusive right to digitize and sell my designs as an embroidery file.

As always, I want happy customers so if you have any questions or concerns, please message me so I can assist you.

results.title: Mangia Bene, Ridi Spesso, Ama Molto Family Name and Established Date, Italian family decor, Eat well laugh often love much, wall decal
results.description:
Mangia Bene, Ridi Spesso, Ama Molto
Family name and Established Date

Italian for Eat well, Laugh often, Love much

Color shown is White.  

Please specify Family name and Established Date in the Notes to Seller at checkout

Additional sizes available by request.

♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ 

I use the best vinyl available, Oracal 631, for all of the designs.  It is rated for 3 years outdoors and lasts indoors for 10+ years.  

Vinyl lettering looks like it was professionally painted.  It has a matte finish and is easy to apply.  It is also easy to remove without damage to walls and other surfaces.  However, it cannot be repositioned or re-used. It adheres best to clean, dry, smooth surfaces: painted walls, glass, metal, doors, cabinet doors, plastic, sanded wood, tile, cell phones, laptops, car windows, etc.  Small color samples are available on request.
 
Many sizes are available and I can adjust the size to fit your space.  As the size goes up or down the price will change accordingly. Convo me for pricing for specialized designs. 

Each order comes with a small vinyl sample (so you can practice) and an applicator card.  For perfect placement most orders have several "+" signs across the top which are center and level marks.  For orders with multiple colors, triangles are placed in the design for perfect alignment as shown in the last picture for those listings.

results.title: Live Laugh Leaf (Love) Planter Pot White or Original with Black Letters made from Terracotta Ceramic for Succulents or Plants
results.description:
Live Laugh Leaf (Love) Planter Pot White or Original with Black Letters made from Terracotta Ceramic for Succulents or Plants

Hand painted terracotta planters with drainage hole. 

Black lettering. 

Multiple sizes available:
•3 inch
•3.5 inch
•5 inch (pictured)
•6 inch

**Does not include saucer**

**If you would like to add a saucer please click the link below which will direct you to saucer options in my store**

https://etsy.me/3iGRUIX

**Plant is NOT included**

Terracotta is an awesome decision for any of your plants. The pots are slightly porous which helps to prevent root rot & give them just the right amount of good nutrients to grow healthy.

Being that these beauties are individually handmade & crafted just for you, the planter you receive will most likely look different than the pot you see pictured. The differences in lettering placement ensures each item is handmade with good vibes & great care especially for you or who ever is cool enough for you to get this for.

Custom orders are welcome!!!
Just message me with any questions & we can get started putting your vision into motion. Traditional, contemporary, rustic or inappropriate wording always accepted! 

Customized orders are non-refundable**

**Shipping times may have delayed when being shipped USPS. I personally cannot guarantee delivery times but orders on my end will be packed and shipped within 1-3 days as I always put my customers first**

**Any damage to delivered packages are COVERED with insurance through USPS. When your order arrives you will see it was packed with so much care and labeled “fragile.” After the item leaves my possession at the Post Office, I cannot be held accountable for mishandled or stolen deliveries. If there is damage, you personally will have to complete a claim request which I will be more than happy to walk you through. DO NOT throw away your packing slip or the box as you will have to send pictures to USPS. The refund will come from USPS & not myself personally. If this should happen, please message me before leaving feedback as I can help to alleviate the situation. The trust I have in my relationships with customers is my main focus**

**Always reach out to me for any comments, questions or concerns. Have an awesome day**
